title: CoinPotPS
author: CoinPotPS
content: Coin Pot He's back again https://coinpot.cc

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: DO NOT CLICK THE ABOVE LINK OR TRUST IT.THE OFFICIAL COINPOT ACCOUNT IS / WAS: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1057561The original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2007856.0This is 99.999% a scam.Until they prove who they are keep away.-Dave

comments.author: CoinPotPS
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on December 16, 2023, 02:17:45 PMDO NOT CLICK THE ABOVE LINK OR TRUST IT.THE OFFICIAL COINPOT ACCOUNT IS / WAS: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1057561The original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2007856.0This is 99.999% a scam.Until they prove who they are keep away.-DaveNo, sir, it is not a scam. We profit from advertisements and donationsOur site also has special rules and laws, so do not rush to judge us or complain about your good opinion of us

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 16, 2023, 02:22:09 PMQuote from: DaveF on December 16, 2023, 02:17:45 PMDO NOT CLICK THE ABOVE LINK OR TRUST IT.THE OFFICIAL COINPOT ACCOUNT IS / WAS: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1057561The original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2007856.0This is 99.999% a scam.Until they prove who they are keep away.-DaveNo, sir, it is not a scam. We profit from advertisements and donationsOur site also has special rules and laws, so do not rush to judge us or complain about your good opinion of usCan you prove you are not by showing us exactly what you do and how you do it and how long you have been doing it?Its always easy to claim to be who you are not until its time to walk in the shoes of one who you aren't. I have learnt to believe more in the actions of people than in their words as not everyone is able to deliver on their words said but if you behold an act, you will for a fact know that the person has the competence to carryout that particular activity.So, give us more than just words of identification and let us in on how you have ran the Coin Pot for as long as it existed citing the quoted thread.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 16, 2023, 02:22:09 PMNo, sir, it is not a scam. We profit from advertisements and donationsHe is probably right, prove to us that you are not scammers. For example, log in through this account and post here an update since you claim that you are backQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 16, 2023, 02:22:09 PMOur site also has special rules and laws, so do not rush to judge us or complain about your good opinion of usWhat rules? I don't seem to see any. Funny thing is that there are no terms of service anywhere.

comments.author: CoinPotPS
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 16, 2023, 11:12:53 PMQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 16, 2023, 02:22:09 PMNo, sir, it is not a scam. We profit from advertisements and donationsHe is probably right, prove to us that you are not scammers. For example, log in through this account and post here an update since you claim that you are backQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 16, 2023, 02:22:09 PMOur site also has special rules and laws, so do not rush to judge us or complain about your good opinion of usWhat rules? I don't seem to see any. Funny thing is that there are no terms of service anywhere.Sir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same name, but we are not scammers. We profit using advertisements and donations. Do you get the idea and we provide the service of creating a Bitcoin Wallet?

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same nameYour first words:  QuoteHe's back again

comments.author: CoinPotPS
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on December 17, 2023, 01:40:23 AMQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same nameYour first words:  QuoteHe's back againYes, my friend, this is a promotional offer for the serviceTo attract users so that my site will be popularized quickly

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same name, but we are not scammers.And why did you say you are back again?Have you been here before? Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMWe profit using advertisements and donations. Do you get the idea and we provide the service of creating a Bitcoin Wallet?It doesn't matter. Given that your wallet is not open source, the addresses generated through your website could already be compromised (you have access to the private keys)

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same name, but we are not scammers. We profit using advertisements and donations. Do you get the idea and we provide the service of creating a Bitcoin Wallet?Why do you use the same name then? The original website address was COINPOT.CO and you are using the same address but changing .cc instead of .co, what can we call this? Isn't this phishing?You could have chosen any other name or at least told people that you are not the original COINPOT service, but this way you presented it in the topic made all members think that you are a scammer.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:56:48 AMYes, my friend, this is a promotional offer for the serviceTo attract users so that my site will be popularized quicklyCan you make a screenshot of the site and add more details about the service description? If there is any similarity or match with ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2007856.0, then I will give you negative trust and it is better for you to stop.If the service description is completely different, it is better to avoid using words such as Coin Pot He's back again

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.created_time: December 18, 2023, 09:13:37 AMLast edit: December 20, 2023, 09:55:11 AM by ETFbitcoin
comments.body: I checked the website and found some red flags,1. This statement. Bitcoin is decentralized, there's no thing such as official wallet. Even Bitcoin Core only referred as reference client/software.Quote from: coinpot dot ccWe created a Bitcoin Official wallet in accordance with the principles laid down by Satoshi Nakamoto, the creator of Bitcoin:2. Stating 4.8 out of 5 ratings without source or references.Quote from: coinpot dot ccBitcoin Official Wallet was rated a 4.8 out of 5 based on 1358 reviews. 3. Wrongfully claim bitcoin.org as official website.Quote from: coinpot dot ccBitcoin represents a new form of currency that's based on a unique technology and philosophy. It's for everyone, and whoever takes advantage of its potential, Bitcoin can offer exciting opportunities for investment and financial freedom. Official website: bitcoin.org/en/4. The website only registered few months ago.Quote from: https://www.whois.com/whois/coinpot.ccDomain:coinpot.ccRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2023-08-21Expires On:2024-08-21Updated On:2023-08-21Status:clientTransferProhibitedThere are few other things i haven't mentioned, but those are more than enough to distrust this website.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: I've never even heard of this brand (.co domain) as a wallet.I signed up to have a look, from the looks of it this is just a site that was created overnight. From a security perspective, I think this is even very far from the principles of cryptography. Did the previous site also have something similar?Web wallets aren't really a priority option, plus after seeing your site I think people will increasingly avoid using web wallets.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: in the first statement you say "he's back again" and i'm sure that it refers to something else. but in another statement you said that you are a new company that has the same name as coinpot. the way you confuse people already shows that you are not serious about this and there is a big possibility that you are a scammer. even your website looks like it was designed by a middle school kid, it's not trustworthy at all.

comments.author: CoinPotPS
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 17, 2023, 08:48:12 PMQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same name, but we are not scammers.And why did you say you are back again?Have you been here before? Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMWe profit using advertisements and donations. Do you get the idea and we provide the service of creating a Bitcoin Wallet?It doesn't matter. Given that your wallet is not open source, the addresses generated through your website could already be compromised (you have access to the private keys)The site has been developed from a new open source version https://github.com/OutCast3k/coinbin/This, sir, is an open source project, but we have developed the appearance only to add some ads

comments.author: CoinPotPS
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on December 18, 2023, 08:28:09 AMQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:56:48 AMYes, my friend, this is a promotional offer for the serviceTo attract users so that my site will be popularized quicklyCan you make a screenshot of the site and add more details about the service description? If there is any similarity or match with ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2007856.0, then I will give you negative trust and it is better for you to stop.If the service description is completely different, it is better to avoid using words such as Coin Pot He's back againJust to attract users that's all my intention

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 20, 2023, 12:46:16 PMJust to attract users that's all my intentionThere are many ways to attract users though. Even if you aim to clickbait people I don't think using a similar name and suggesting you're related in one way or the other is a good idea. Surely your marketing department realizes that? This is my first time seeing a service using a clickbait this way.Just take the suggestions from the members above. Change your name (at least make it distinct) or distance yourself from other services unless you want to get tagged as some impersonator.

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 20, 2023, 12:36:58 PMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 17, 2023, 08:48:12 PMQuote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMSir, the idea is that we are a new company with the same name, but we are not scammers.And why did you say you are back again?Have you been here before? Quote from: CoinPotPS on December 17, 2023, 01:17:16 AMWe profit using advertisements and donations. Do you get the idea and we provide the service of creating a Bitcoin Wallet?It doesn't matter. Given that your wallet is not open source, the addresses generated through your website could already be compromised (you have access to the private keys)The site has been developed from a new open source version https://github.com/OutCast3k/coinbin/This, sir, is an open source project, but we have developed the appearance only to add some adsWhether it's true or not, i'd rather use coinb.in since it's open source while coinpot dot cc isn't.
